statements: DELETE FROM music_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND artist = 'Taylor Swift';
DELETE FROM music_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123 AND genre = 'Rock';
DELETE FROM music_recommendations WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM music_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score < 0.5);

DELETE FROM user_history WHERE user_id = 100 AND song_id = 50;
